This notice may not be removed or altered from any source distribution. 20 */ 21 48 #ifndef SDL_render_h_ 49 #define SDL_render_h_ 50 51 #include "SDL_stdinc.h" 52 #include "SDL_rect.h" 53 #include "SDL_video.h" 54 55 #include "begin_code.h" 56 /* Set up for C function definitions, even when using C++ */ 57 #ifdef __cplusplus 58 extern "C" { 59 #endif 60 64 typedef enum 65 { 66 SDL_RENDERER_SOFTWARE = 0x00000001, 67 SDL_RENDERER_ACCELERATED = 0x00000002, 69 SDL_RENDERER_PRESENTVSYNC = 0x00000004, 71 SDL_RENDERER_TARGETTEXTURE = 0x00000008 73 } SDL_RendererFlags; 74 78 typedef struct SDL_RendererInfo 79 { 80 const char *name; 81 Uint32 flags; 82 Uint32 num_texture_formats; 83 Uint32 texture_formats[16]; 84 int max_texture_width; 85 int max_texture_height; 86 } SDL_RendererInfo; 87 91 typedef struct SDL_Vertex 92 { 93 SDL_FPoint position; 94 SDL_Color color; 95 SDL_FPoint tex_coord; 96 } SDL_Vertex; 97 101 typedef enum 102 { 103 SDL_ScaleModeNearest, 104 SDL_ScaleModeLinear, 105 SDL_ScaleModeBest 106 } SDL_ScaleMode; 107 111 typedef enum 112 { 113 SDL_TEXTUREACCESS_STATIC, 114 SDL_TEXTUREACCESS_STREAMING, 115 SDL_TEXTUREACCESS_TARGET 116 } SDL_TextureAccess; 117 121 typedef enum 122 { 123 SDL_TEXTUREMODULATE_NONE = 0x00000000, 124 SDL_TEXTUREMODULATE_COLOR = 0x00000001, 125 SDL_TEXTUREMODULATE_ALPHA = 0x00000002 126 } SDL_TextureModulate; 127 131 typedef enum 132 { 133 SDL_FLIP_NONE = 0x00000000, 134 SDL_FLIP_HORIZONTAL = 0x00000001, 135 SDL_FLIP_VERTICAL = 0x00000002 136 } SDL_RendererFlip; 137 141 struct SDL_Renderer; 142 typedef struct SDL_Renderer SDL_Renderer;
